Body:
obs = Observation(features=ObservationFeatures(parameters={'x': 20}), data=
    ObservationData(means=np.array([1]), covariance=np.array([[2]]),
    metric_names=['a']), arm_name='0_0')
self.assertEqual(obs.features, ObservationFeatures(parameters={'x': 20}))
self.assertEqual(obs.data, ObservationData(means=np.array([1]), covariance=
    np.array([[2]]), metric_names=['a']))
self.assertEqual(obs.arm_name, '0_0')
obs2 = Observation(features=ObservationFeatures(parameters={'x': 20}), data
    =ObservationData(means=np.array([1]), covariance=np.array([[2]]),
    metric_names=['a']), arm_name='0_0')
self.assertEqual(obs, obs2)
obs3 = Observation(features=ObservationFeatures(parameters={'x': 10}), data
    =ObservationData(means=np.array([1]), covariance=np.array([[2]]),
    metric_names=['a']), arm_name='0_0')
self.assertNotEqual(obs, obs3)
self.assertNotEqual(obs, 1)
